hero.tagline: A blood pact signed in despair
hero.desc: To break the vampire's magic, a father must hunt the creature responsible. In this misty forest, blood is the only currency left for your humanity.

items.title: The Cursed Father
items.desc: His soul is tethered to blood magic. Every strike saves his son's life, but costs him his own humanity.

items.title: The Necromancer
items.desc: Victim of a vampire attack. His veins now flow with a magic that only his father's sacrifice can contain.

items.title: The Blood Stalker
items.desc: An ancient creature of the mist. It doesn't just want blood; it wants the cycle of suffering to never end.

features.title: The Hunt Begins
features.desc: Will you find the creature before the blood magic consumes what's left of your soul?

members.name: Lucas
members.bio: Signed the first pact. Master of blood magic and code.

members.name: Member 2
members.bio: Weaves the threads of the curse to ensure no one escapes the woods.

members.name: Member 3
members.bio: Gives shape to the shadows and color to the visceral remains.
